archimate:Requirement.name: 4.51.6 External networks access availability control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The organisation should help to ensure the availability of access to managed services (e.g. cloud services) by: investing in robust, reliable internet connectivity establishing multiple methods of connection (e.g. wired networks, wireless, 4G/LTE (long-term evolu-tion) and 5G) providing required network band-width between the organisation's network and the managed service provider (i.e. to avoid poor network latency) maintaining links with the organisa-tion's legacy systems.
